nodes.bodyText: Lets make a copy of this list as it can potentially be modified by the consumer or change the return type to collection.
This is only used by DebugCapture Manager which takes a List as constructor parameter.

This check seems to be redundant here.
If we expect statusApiService to be null, then we should check it before beamWorkerStatusGrpcService creation.
Also, I expect BeamWorkerStatusGrpcService.create to throw exception if the creation fails so it will never be null.
Lets shutdown the logging server at the last.
Can we shut them down in parallel?

Let's expose addStatusPage in the worker. Which will add the page as both servlet and capturePage.
Alternatively, we can pass beamWorkerStatusGrpcService to StreamingDataflowWorker where it can create the sdkWorkerStatusServlet and use it.
We can skip reimplmenting this method.
